page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content:
When it was a quarter past three we packed up and sat on the carpet for a story. It was called{The Borrowers. At half past three we got on the bus. I sat with Kirsty. When I got home I saw my Mum and then she had to go out.
My Dad came home and my cousin phoned to say that we were going riding. I got Kas in and tacked up. I met Caroline, Vicki and Tracey on {Stonebarrow.
Two hours later I was back home. It was eight o'clock. My Mum gave me some tea and I watched television for half an hour. We watched "Allo,Allo." When it ended we went to bed.
